description.value: Display logged work statuses by epics, sprint, issue, issue types, users, projects, and accounts. Viewable in pie chart, donut chart, and column chart format.

name.value: Tempo Account Custom Budget Burn-up Chart

description.value: Displays a burn-up chart of the account's customized goal for the selected period.

name.value: Tempo Account Monthly Budget Burn-up Chart

description.value: Displays a burn-up chart of the account's monthly budget for the selected period.
Display a user's timesheet, filtered by periods.
Display a team's timesheet, filtered by periods.
Display planned, worked, and required hours for each team member to track overall planned and worked time.
Display hours worked and planned by the current user, viewable by pie chart or column chart.
Display people in version and how much they have worked on it.
Display all trackers and create new ones.
Displays all logged hours to the customer's accounts. The data can be displayed using pie chart, column chart or table.
Display total hours, for a period by Account/Categories/Customer, viewable by pie chart, column chart or by table
